DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effects of intravenous insulin/24 hours to normalize glycemia upon markers of oxidative stress (protein oxidation and total antioxidant defense) and inflammation (C-reactive protein (CRP) and sCD40L) in diabetic patients submitted to PCI with stent.
DOC.brief_title: Intravenous Insulin in Patients With Diabetes After Percutaneous Coronary Intervention (PCI)
DOC.criteria: Patients with Diabetes Mellitus submitted to Percutaneous Coronary Intervention with Stent bare metal Age: 1880 years old Restenosis Drug elution stent Acute coronary syndrome at last 30 days Use anti inflammatory, antibiotic, vitamin E Inflammatory disease or oncologic
DOC.keyword: Patients with Diabetes Mellitus Submitted to Percutaneous Coronary Intervention with Stent
